item.title: Physiotherapy after COVID-19
item.description: Physiotherapy for recovery after COVID-19 An infection with the Coronavirus (COVID-19) can have a significant impact on your health. It is important to start physiotherapy as soon as possible after hospitalization. Even if you have not been admitted to hospital, guidance by a physiotherapist may be necessary because you have been inactive for a long time. Make appointment Home / En / Physiotherapy after COVID-19 ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡± Even if you have not been admitted to hospital, guidance by a physiotherapist may be necessary because you have been inactive for a long time.

item.description: Opening hours Fysiotherapie Douma **Day** **Opening hours** Monday 07:00 - 21:00 Tuesday 07:00 - 17:00 Wednesday 07:00 - 17:00 Thursday 07:00 - 21:00 Friday 07:00 - 17:00 Saturday 08:00 - 13:00 Sunday Closed

item.title: Medical Taping Treatment
item.description: Medical Taping Treatment Medical taping is a treatment method in which muscle activity is used to help recovery after injuries. Muscles aid blood flow and the draining of waste substances through the body. Make an appointment Home / En / Medical Taping Treatment Medical taping uses elastic tapes which support muscles without obstructing them. The muscle activity improves tissue blood flow and so aids recovery. Medical tape vs.

item.title: Orthopaedic Revalidation
item.description: Orthopaedic Revalidation Revalidation after a knee- hip-, or shoulder injury. Make an appointment Home / En / Orthopaedic Revalidation Orthopaedic revalidation is suitable for patients which have undergone an orthopaedic operation in the hospital. You can also be directly referred to a physiotherapist by an orthopaedic surgeon, without an operation. Common orthopaedic operations include hip- and knee operations such as total hip prosthesis, and posterior cruciate ligament-, meniscus-, or viewing operations.

item.title: Medical fitness
item.description: Medical Fitness In addition to physiotherapy, also exercise in Hilversum under expert supervision Make an appointment Home / En / Medical fitness More about medical fitness Medical fitness helps maintain or improve your health. To have enough energy for your daily life, you might want to improve your condition or lose weight, but not in a crowded fitness centrum surrounded by top-fit athletes. In the practices of Physiotherapy Douma, we understand this.

item.title: Business Fitness
item.description: On average, this increases the work productivity by 12,5% and decreases absences by 2%. More about the business-fitness scan Many businesses wrestle with high absence rates and low work productivity. An important factor in this is the health and wellbeing of the employees. The business-fitness scan doesn’t look at the absence rates in the business but at the wellbeing of the employees (or lack thereof). We combine this with a general health scan of the company as a whole.

item.title: Acquired brain injuries
item.description: Acquired brain injuries Brain injury that has occurred after birth, for example as a result of an accident. Make an appointment Home / En / Acquired brain injuries More about acquired brain injuries (ABI) Physiotherapy Douma has strong connections to the category of patients with an acquired brain injury. Acquired brain injuries, or ABI, refers too injuries which have been dealt to the brain during a person’s life.

item.title: Pregnancy-fit and Mom-fit
item.description: Pregnancy-fit and Mom-fit Are you looking for an active lesson to keep exercising during and after pregnancy and do you also want some more information about this period and what comes after it? Then Pregnancy-fit and Mom-fit is something for you! Make an appointment Home / En / Pregnancy-fit and Mom-fit Pregnancy-fit / Mom-fit is a contemporary cursus for women who are pregnant or have recently given birth.

item.title: ParkinsonsNet
item.description: ParkinsonsNet The network for healthcare providers for Parkinson’s patients. Make an appointment Home / En / ParkinsonsNet ParkinsonNet is a national network of healthcare providers which are specialised in treating and assisting Parkinson patients. More than 2700 healthcare providers (neurologists, occupational therapists, logopaedics, and nurses, among others) are connected to this network. The goal of ParkinsonNet is to provide the very best healthcare possible to everyone with Parkinson’s disease or an atypical parkinsonism.

item.title: Pelvic physiotherapy
item.description: Pelvic physiotherapy Pelvic physiotherapy is focused on improving the function of the muscles in and around the pelvis. Make an appointment Home / En / Pelvic physiotherapy Indications for pelvic physiotherapy Loss of urine, needing to urinate abnormally often Loss of defecation or flatulence, abnormal need to use the bathroom, constipation Pain during sex Diastasis Pain in the pelvic floor Women: prolapse, pelvic pain during pregnancy Men: erection- and ejaculation problems Are you affected by one of these afflictions?

item.title: Dizziness
item.description: Dizziness Dizziness can express itself in many forms. What you feel as a patient can differ from person to person. Make an appointment Home / En / Dizziness More about dizziness You might feel like you’re floating; as if the world is spinning around you, or as if you are turning around yourself. Sometimes you forget where you are and have the feeling you are falling down.

item.title: Acupuncture treatment in Hilversum - Make an appointment
item.description: Acupuncture treatment in Hilversum A widely used medicine (especially in China) in which needles are inserted into the subcutaneous connective tissue at very specific points. Make an appointment Home / En / Acupuncture treatment in Hilversum - Make an appointment ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡± Acupuncture treatment in Hilversum? Do you need acupuncture treatment, because you can’t get rid of chronic or acute afflictions? Then the Physiotherapy Douma’s acupuncturist will gladly help you.

item.title: Dry Needling in Hilversum?
item.description: Dry Needling Hilversum Dry needling is a treatment method whereby a very thin needle is inserted into the skin and muscle. Make an appointment Home / En / Dry Needling in Hilversum? Dry needling is very effective against myofascial pain and triggerpoints. Triggerpoints are tiny areas of hardened tissue in muscles, which can cause radiating pain issues. ‘Dry’ indicates that nothing is injected through the needle; it is only use to puncture the triggerpoint.

item.title: Jaw physiotherapy in Hilversum with 40+ years of experience
item.description: Jaw physiotherapy The most important components of the jaw are the jaw joint, the teeth, and the chewing muscles. Make an appointment Home / En / Jaw physiotherapy in Hilversum with 40+ years of experience More about jaw physiotherapy The most common symptoms of jaw- or facial problems are: Pain or tiredness in the chewing muscles Trouble with opening one’s mouth Pain in or around the jaw joints (in front of the ears) Snapping or creaking jaw joints Overly sensitive or painful teeth Abnormal erosion of the teeth Ear pain Headaches Neck pain If you recognise one or more of these symptoms, there is a chance that you are suffering from facial problems.

item.title: Geriatric Physiotherapy
item.description: Geriatric Physiotherapy in Hilversum Geriatrics is the medical specialisation which busies itself with the treatment of the elderly and those who, due to illness, show symptoms of advanced age (due to for example Parkinsonâ€™s or rheumatoid arthritis). Make an appointment Home / En / Geriatric Physiotherapy More about geriatric physiotherapy Geriatrics does not only concern itself with afflictions related to for example problematic memory issues or dementia, but also with the whole: all (bodily and mental) afflictions and issues.

item.title: Physiotherapy in Hilversum
item.description: Physiotherapy in Hilversum Looking for a trustworthy physiotherapist in Hilversum? Physiotherapy Douma is glad to be of your assistance. Our therapists treat you with personal attention and a smile. Make an appointment Home / En / Physiotherapy in Hilversum Make an appointment with Physiotherapy Douma Physiotherapy Douma employs experienced physiotherapists, each with their own specialisations. Physiotherapy focuses on afflictions related to movement of the body. We treat your affliction with various methods.

item.title: Edema therapy
item.description: Edema therapy The lymph nodes lie close to major organs and contain the janitors and policemen of the bloodstream, the white blood cells. Due to a disturbed balance between the supplying and draining of moisture an abnormal accumulation of moisture can develop, also known as an oedema. Make an appointment Home / En / Edema therapy More about edema therapy Problems in the lymphatic system can be congenital (primary lymph oedema), but usually lymph oedema occurs as a result of severe damage to the lymph nodes or lymph vessels (secondary lymph edema).

item.title: Manual therapy Hilversum
item.description: Manual therapy The goal of manual therapy is on the one hand the improvement of the functioning of the joints and on the other hand the improvement of posture and movement. To achieve this, the manual therapist uses a number of specific techniques which can be applied in the joints. Make an appointment Home / En / Manual therapy Hilversum More about manual therapy The effects of manual therapy are often immediately noticeable; you experience improved freedom of movement and a decrease in pain.

item.title: Make an appointment
item.description: Make an appointment Via the form you can easily register for a physiotherapy appointment at our practice. Once we have received this form, we will call you within 1 working day to make an appointment. This form is sent via a secure SSL connection (see the padlock in the address bar) and can therefore not be intercepted by third parties.

item.title: Practice information

Make an appointment Home / En / Practice information We stand for Personal attention Goal-focused care Customer satisfaction Guaranteed high quality treatment More about our practices Our practice always works with the newest insights and regulations in physiotherapy, and we are audited yearly.

item.title: Fysiotherapie Douma Hilversum
item.description: Do you need physiotherapy in Hilversum? We’re always nearby For all physiotherapy in Hilversum you can go to Physical Therapy Douma. With 3 locations in Hilversum, there is always a location near you. The physiotherapists at Fysiotherapie Douma all have their own specialization and, if necessary, come to the entire Gooi area. Never been with us? No problem! We look forward to receiving you in one of our physiotherapy practices.
